full_description: Who Are We?A Santa Barbara based agriculture company looking to add and employ a full-time Mobile developer who specializes in AppSheet (preferred but not required) to our growing tech department.Who are we looking for?AppSheet is relatively new codeless app development platform recently acquired by Google and we’re looking to staff someone who has experience and familiarity with the system. An expert would be preferred, but given how new the platform is, we’re also open to developers with extensive mobile development experience.What the job like?Work with our internal tech team and stakeholders to custom build app-driven solutions for the best experience and workflow possible. No two days are ever the same and we’re always working on new and exciting projects to drive the business forward in a casual but fast-paced environment.ExperienceAppSheet Experience a plusWorking with Databases (database architecture is a plus)Extensive Spreadsheet ExperienceDatabase ExperienceWhat's In It For You?Competitive SalariesMedical, Dental, Vision Insurance401kPaid Time OffGrowth OpportunitiesGreat company cultureHours and AvailabilityThis is a full-time positionThis is an on-site positionJob Type: Full-timePay: $30.00 - $45.00 per hourBenefits:401(k)401(k) matchingDental insuranceHealth insuranceLife insurancePaid time offVision insuranceSchedule:8 hour shiftMonday to FridayEducation:High school or equivalent (Preferred)Experience:Mobile Development: 2 years (Required)general programming or scripting: 2 years (Required)Spreadsheet: 2 years (Required)Work Location:One locationThis Company Describes Its Culture as:Outcome-oriented -- results-focused with strong performance culturePeople-oriented -- supportive and fairness-focusedTeam-oriented -- cooperative and collaborativeBenefit Conditions:Waiting period may applyOnly full-time employees eligibleWork Remotely:No
